trans-unit.source: Represents a lightweight audio playback <xref href="System.Windows.TriggerAction"></xref> used to play .wav files.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction"></xref> class.
Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction"></xref> class.
After <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction.Dispose%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction> object is no longer valid.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction.Dispose%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Gets or sets the audio source location.
Both relative and absolute pack [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] can be used to identify audio files that are of the following types:
**Resource Files**: files with a build action of `Resource`.
**Content Files**: files with a build action of `Content`.
**Site Of Origin Files**: files with a build action of `None`.
For more information on pack [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md).

For more information on resource, content, and site of origin files, see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md).
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction.Source%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Dependency Property Information
Identifier Field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The audio source location.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction.Source"></xref> dependency property.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction.SourceProperty> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
